siblings: Durin, Primordial Albedo, Rifthounds ("Brother", Rhinedottir's other creations)

1.name: Flower of Eden
1.effect: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

2.name: Opening of Phanerozoic
2.effect:
Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
This effect stacks up to 4 times.

3.name: Grace of Helios
3.effect: Increases the Level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

4.name: Descent of Divinity
4.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

5.name: Tide of Hadean
5.effect: Increases the Level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

6.name: Dust of Purification
6.effect: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

description: Albedo — an alchemist based in Mondstadt, in the service of the Knights of Favonius."Genius," "Kreideprinz," or "Captain of the Investigation Team"... Such titles and honors are of no consequence to him when there is so much more research to conduct.The pursuit of fortune and connections cannot hold a candle to his heart's desire — acquiring the limitless, obscure knowledge left behind by previous generations of scholars.Description from the Official Website[1]

teamcomps.title: Klee Double Geo
teamcomps.description: Another team that focuses on the raw damage output of it's characters.

teamcomps.title: Xiao Double Geo
teamcomps.description: The premier Xiao team. Jean is the healer and battery, Albedo provides consistent off field damage and Zhongli provides anemo shred and a strong shield. All this makes this one of the best Xiao teams.

teamcomps.title: Ningguang Hypercarry
teamcomps.description:
A team meant for a sustained dps Ningguang. Running a C6 Gorou instead of Bennett is viable but not recommended as Bennett helps with Ningguang's low attack stat. For Zhongli here, you can either pick a shield build or a shield-burst hybrid build. 

Recommended artifact sets:
Ningguang: 2-pc Archaic Petra and 2-pc Gladiator's Finale/Shimenawa Reminiscence

Albedo: 4-pc Husk of Opulent Dreams

Bennett: 4-pc Noblesse Oblige

Zhongli: 4-pc Tenacity of the Millelith for shield build. 2-pc Tenacity of the Millelith and 2-pc Noblesse Oblige for hybrid build.

teamcomps.title: Timber Wolf
teamcomps.description:
So, this team also has a huge dmg output coz of 2 strong subdps unit xingqiu and albedo and double geo resonance. 

BUILDS: Xingqiu Emblem Sac, Albedo Husk of opulent dreams, Zhongli Milelith favonious lance

ROTATIONS: albedo E, Zhongli Q ,E(hold), Albedo Q, Xingqiu Q, E , Razor E, Q or whatever u want razor is quite unga bunga so really don't need to worry about rotations

teamcomps.title: Ningguang Hypercarry-C6 Gorou ver
teamcomps.description:
The alternative team for [Ningguang Hypercarry]. Only use when you have C6 Gorou. See the other guide for more details. 

Recommended artifact sets for Gorou:
4-pc Husk of Opulent Dreams
2-pc Husk of Opulent Dreams and 2-pc Emblem of Severed Fate

teamcomps.title: Hu Tao Double Geo
teamcomps.description:
One of the more comfortable Hu Tao teams to run. It combines the strong core of Hu Tao and Xingqiu with a strong Geo core. Zhongli provides a strong shield and/or Nuke and Albedo provides additional damage and EM share via his burst.

Albedo can be replaced for Yun Jin/Ningguang/Geo Traveller.
